abstract: In an attempt to attract more users, Microsoft is introducing a new rebate service for shoppers who find products through its search engine.
snippet: In an attempt to attract more users, Microsoft is introducing a new rebate service for shoppers who find products through its search engine.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE | 5/21 3:00 PM Added information from the official introduction and more background.

headline.main: Microsoft Searching for Users With Rebates
